en: District of Columbia National Guard card for John L. Wallace

The card includes Wallace's name, signature, serial number, company, and unit commander (Robert S. Williams). Wallace's full name is given as John Lamond Wallace and his company is listed as "Co C 171st M.P. Bn DCNG." The card was issued on July 19, 1948. It notes that the holder is charged "with uniform and courteous military bearing and action."
